General.Name: Premier Limited
General.Description: Premier Limited engages in the engineering businesses in India. The company manufactures CNC Machines and mechanical components for the wind energy and infrastructure sectors. It also offers professional and engineering related services. The company was formerly known as The Premier Automobiles Ltd. and changed its name to Premier Limited in March 2005. Premier Limited was incorporated in 1944 and is based in Mumbai, India.
